doc:
The_Remake http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Remake 0 A remake is a reproduction of a film, television series, video game, or similar form of entertainment that is based on an earlier production. A remake tells the same story as the original, but is often updated with a contemporary theme or for a more contemporary audience. A remake is a reproduction of a film, television series, video game, or similar form of entertainment that is based on an earlier production. A remake tells the same story as the original, but is often updated with a contemporary theme or for a more contemporary audience.
